title: Perma Ban for scripting
body: Hey how are you? i am just wondering if i am able to get my account unbanned. i was originally banned for scripting which i admit and i do and take full responsibility for my actions. i will never do this again and i am wondering if it is possible to see if i can play this game again? thanks for your consideration riot. thanks and sorry again.

replies.body: No. You script then you deserve ban no questions asked.

no.

make a new account.

do it again.

get b& again.
